label: zarAt
peekOfCode:
def zarAt(zarlar):
    donmeZamani = rd.randint(1,100)
    for i in range(donmeZamani):
        lblZar.configure(text="{}{}".format( rd.choice(zarlar), rd.choice(zarlar) ) )
        lblZar.pack()
        zamaniYavaslat = ((i+1)/donmeZamani)/4
        t.sleep(zamaniYavaslat)
        pencere.update()
btnZarat = tk.Button(pencere, text="ZAR AT", font=30, bg="red",fg="white", \
                     width=20,height=2, command=lambda:zarAt(zarlar))

label: tosbik
peekOfCode:
tosbik = tosba.Turtle()
tosbik.shape("turtle")
tosbik.speed(15)
for i in range(2000):
    adim= rd.randint(0,10)

    tosbik.forward(adim)
    tosbik.right(aci)
pencere.mainloop()

pencere.geometry("300x50")
etiket = tk.Label(pencere, text="Metin", font = 30)
etiket.pack(side=tk.LEFT, padx=5)

giris.pack(side=tk.LEFT, padx=5)

dugme.pack(side=tk.LEFT, padx=5)
pencere.mainloop()
